intro.description: In this task you'll learn how to install the predefined logo environment, create and run a runtime workbench, intall the predefined logo samples.

item.title: Get the tutorial projects
item.description:
The projects of the tutorialmus tbe installed using :
File->New->Examples...->Kermeta->Building kmlogo DSL tools with kermeta

item.title: Create a runtime configuration
item.description:
Ibn order to run the samples, you'll need a "RuntimeWorkbench". If you don't already have one :
- Run->Open Run Dialog...
- Right click on "Eclipse application", new
- rename the configuration from "New_configuration" to "RuntimeWorkbench"

item.title: Start the runtime workbench
item.description:
There are several ways in eclipse to start a configuration. The simpliest is to use the "Run" menu, Open Run Dialog... and select the configuration you wish.
Later you'll be able to use the Run history to quickly re-run a given configuration.

item.title: Get the tutorial sample files
item.description:
In the new workbench, you can retreive the predefined samples files for Logo in
File->New->Examples...->Kermeta->Km Logo samples
